ing: 1 (16 ounce) can pineapple in juice, chilled
1 (15 ounce) can cream of coconut (such as Coco LopezÂ®)
des: "I created this recipe after experimenting with many different types of frozen-fruit smoothies. My husband and I no longer make it except when we're hosting guests in our home in Hawaii, as we were drinking it too often (and it is certainly not a low-calorie beverage). It is an awesome substitute for frozen alcoholic mixed drinks."
ins: Blend pineapple, strawberries, cream of coconut, and vanilla extract together in a blender until smooth.
